description: The originator of a request, as identified by the request authentication system. There are three ways of matching an originator; by user, group, or service account.

group.description: The group of the request originator. Required when `type` is set to '`Group`'.

serviceAccount.description: The service account of the request originator. Required when `type` is set to '`ServiceAccount`'.

user.description: The service account of the request originator. Required when `type` is set to '`User`'.
